ygData.subject: Land Mine's dreams...
ygData.msgSnippet: Land Mine dreams that she is still in this weird, empty world, where there is nothing. She looks around. Parts of Time Bomb are splattered all over

Land Mine dreams that she is still in this weird, empty world, where there =
is nothing. She looks around. Parts of Time Bomb are splattered all over ev=
ery...thing that isn't there! Land Mine feels the need to faint. KitKat cam=
e up behind her (This is a dream, no accusing of moding) and attacks her fr=
om behind. KitKat joins Deemos at his side, and they tear Land Mine apart. =
Land Mine's dream changes again. It's nothing, almost like she just had her=
 eyes closed. But Deemos was talking to her.

"Land Mine, you know what's r=
ight, come back to me, I don't want to kill you, honest, I just want to mak=
e you all better!" Deemos said. in her mind. Deemos spoke into a commlink, =
speaking to Land Mine through it. That part wasn't a dream, Deemo could sti=
ll talk to Land Mine through commlink.

"Land Mine, about killing Time Bomb=
, that was an accident, we were trying to make him better, SAB and Rizopas,=
 they are our friends, and they were just trying to make you better, they w=
eren't trying to hurt Time Bomb. I heard you say it, that Time Bomb is dead=
, your talking in your sleep again Land Mine! And I'll get you! It may not =
be today, maybe not tomorrow, but...no actually, it could be anyday! I WILL=
 GET YOU LAND MINE!" Deemos yelled. He broke out into chilling laughter.

"=
Now, who else do we have to kill besides Land Mine?" Artist asked confused.=


"We have to kill Psuedo, too." Deemos said. Artist didn't understand this=
, but he wasn't going to question Deemos, he was right, after all.

Plintis=
sa couldn't believe what she was hearing! Her spark mate wouldn't listen to=
 her! Why was this? She realized that Deemos blocked her off. Plintissa rem=
embered her dream, Deemos attacked and killed her in that dream. Plintissa =
had to figure out how to contact Artist, and quick!...
